panels.description: Jobs merged from the providers into the work stream.
panels.title: Merged Jobs / h

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(tempo_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"backend-scheduler", route!~"debug_pprof|metrics|ready"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, route, namespace, cluster))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(tempo_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"backend-scheduler", route!~"debug_pprof|metrics|ready"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, route, namespace, cluster))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(tempo_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"backend-scheduler", route!~"debug_pprof|metrics|ready"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, route, namespace, cluster))
